column2: "Oh, <%me>, do you have a minute? I wanted to ask you to join me on a client order."
"It seems like Zeno needs some time to himself, and I totally get that."
"But with me being who I am, I get all worried when I'm on my own. I feel so much better if there's somebody else with me."
"Whenever you have some spare time, I would really appreciate it. Thanks!"
